body:
plot.minimum_fps
k3d.volume(mask=[], mask_opacities=[])
k3d.mip(mask=[], mask_opacities=[])
time series camera animation improvements
remove legacy code
k3d.volume speed up
version bump

## What's Changed
* Corrected binder link by @habi in https://github.com/K3D-tools/K3D-jupyter/pull/328
* Corrected binder link (readme fix from #328) by @tgandor in https://github.com/K3D-tools/K3D-jupyter/pull/329
* Fix: lookup correct texture attribute by @agoose77 in https://github.com/K3D-tools/K3D-jupyter/pull/337
* fix a trivial typo in a comment by @williamstein in https://github.com/K3D-tools/K3D-jupyter/pull/341
* fix typos and improve English while looking at the docs by @williamstein in https://github.com/K3D-tools/K3D-jupyter/pull/342
* 2.13.0 by @artur-trzesiok in https://github.com/K3D-tools/K3D-jupyter/pull/346

## New Contributors
* @habi made their first contribution in https://github.com/K3D-tools/K3D-jupyter/pull/328
* @agoose77 made their first contribution in https://github.com/K3D-tools/K3D-jupyter/pull/337
* @williamstein made their first contribution in https://github.com/K3D-tools/K3D-jupyter/pull/341

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/K3D-tools/K3D-jupyter/compare/2.12.0...v2.13.0

Breaking changes:

Snapshots feature (snapshot are not longer compatible - beetwen 2.9.x and 2.10.x)

new object: k3d.labels (examples/labels.ipynb)
snapshot camera improvement
axesHelper optimization
new text property - on_top
k3d.label, k3d.text and k3d.text2d have label_box property and it's True by default.
k3d.mesh new attribute - side
k3d.mip
scientific notation for colormap 
object manipulation (roration, position, scale) via GUI
unicode in Text Drawable
Support to html text (is_html=True)
plot.snalshot_include_js
new control camera mode: trackball, orbit, fly

name: v1.0.1
body:
Add k3d for Python3 in Docker
Add support for transforming unicode and bytes types

name: Release v1.0.0
body:
- add detached window mode
- add selecting voxel paint color
- update project requirements

name: Release v0.9.0
body:
- Add support for texture from remote host
- Add object removal ability
- Add ability to fetch_data from front-end
- Add camera auto-fit support
- Fix loosing order information on object update

name: Release v0.8.0
body:
- add object update ability
- fix multiple display call issue

name: Release 0.7.0
body:
- ensure using floats for base matrix
- remove zmin and zmax from surface
- add full Python3 support
- add k3d.version information
- change axis orientation

name: Release v0.6.0
body:
- use current k3d for latest features
- refactoring
- python3 related improvements

name: Release v0.5.0
body:
Release v0.5.0
- guess dimensions if possible
- use xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax, zmin, zmax to define view_matrix
- allow one color where a list of colors was expected, set default color to blue
- use integers for colors
- use vectors instead of vector
- unify vector2d and vector3d as vectors_fields

name: Release v0.4.0
body:
Added support for number of objects:
- vector
- vector field (2D)
- vector field (3D)
- texture
- voxels

Additional:
- Added grid on scene
- Added camera auto-fit on scene
- Height and antialiasing is now configurable
- Added fullscreen option

name: Release v0.2.0
body:
Added support for:
- lines
- surfaces
- marching cubes
